import React, { useState } from "react"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; import logo from "./assets/logo.png"; import qr from "./assets/qr.png"; import successImg from "./assets/success.png"; function App() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", occupation: "", date: "", whatsapp: "", email: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .send( "your_service_id", "your_template_id", { name: formData.name, occupation: formData.occupation, date: formData.date, whatsapp: formData.whatsapp, email: formData.email, }, "your_user_id" ) .then((res) => { alert("Form submitted successfully!"); }) .catch((err) => console.error(err)); }; return (
{/* Header */}

SafeCircle

Private Space to Talk

{/* Hero */}

Feeling low or overwhelmed?

SafeCircle offers private, anonymous conversations with empathetic listeners who understand.

{/* Book Session */}

Book a Session

Our team will contact you after payment confirmation.

{/* Payment QR */}

Scan to Pay

{/* Why Trust Us */}

Why Trust Us?

  • 🛡️ 100% Confidential
  • 💬 Non-judgemental Listeners
  • 📞 One-on-one Private Calls
  • 📆 Flexible Scheduling
{/* Pricing */}

Pricing Plans

{[ { title: "One Conversation", price: "₹99", description: "Get on a single, no-judgement call when you need someone to talk to.", }, { title: "Talk Often", price: "₹199/month", description: "Have 3 calm check-in calls each month. Like having a friend on standby.", }, ].map((plan, idx) => (

{plan.title}

{plan.price}

{plan.description}

))}
{/* FAQs */}

FAQs

Is this a therapy service?

No, we provide peer support through conversation, not professional therapy.

Will my conversation be recorded?

No. We strictly follow a no-recording, no-trace policy.

{/* CTA */}

Need Help?

Reach out anytime via WhatsApp or email.

Email Support WhatsApp Us
{/* Footer */}
© 2025 SafeCircle. All rights reserved.
); } export default App;
